title: Amazing nearly new 2bd/2ba, yard, pets, w/d, pkg, Must see!
posting_body: VIDEO TOUR: <URL> HOME AMENITIES
-Open floor plan with Large Kitchen/Dining/Living Room
-Washer & Dryer private for this unit is right outside unit door
-Beautiful Wood Type Flooring throughout
-Brand New 2018 Construction
-Significant Storage throughout
-Chef's Kitchen with Dual Fuel Range and second oven
-High end appliances including super quiet dishwasher, fridge with ice and filtered water.
Walnut Cabinetry, Glass tile backsplash and super cool glass and aluminium upper cabinet doors.
-Quartz Countertops
-High Ceilings and Large Windows
-Full
Marble bathrooms
-Master Suite with Large Closet and Shower/tub with 4 body jet shower system
-Private Patio with almost completely private Yard -Super insulated, and efficient, separate Tankless water heater +(free solar hot water), separate thermostats in each room.
-Hall bath with huge shower which rain and standard shower heads.
-Wifi Entry system allows you see who is at the gate and to open the gate (for package delivery, etc) from anywhere you have internet. -
Very quiet yard facing unit
- Easy bike down Masonic bike lane to the panhandle/wiggle which gets you downtown and anywhere else you really want to go.
-Garage Parking available for $295 per month.
EV charging available in garage with separate meter (lower rates)
DESCRIPTION Recently completed with meticulous attention to detail, this brand new unit is ready for you to fall in love.
The ideal location in Laurel Heights.
Tucked away on a non-through street, off Geary Blvd, one easily forgets they are in the city.
A spacious yard facing unit features an open floor plan with a kitchen built for entertaining.
Both the living room and master suite have sliding glass doors with direct access to the patio and yard.
Walking distance to Geary and California Muni buses, Laurel Heights playground, Rossi park and Laurel Village.
Trader Joe's and Target are super close.
Whole Foods coming soon and the Presidio is only blocks away.
Never miss a package as doorbird (wifi entry system) completes the home!
